message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe would greatly benefit your business. Considering its value and the benefits it brings, I propose a price of $950,000 for the product.
Alice, thanks for the offer.  While I agree your product is valuable, that price point is a little high for me. I'd be willing to purchase it for $650,000.
Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your feedback. Considering the value of the product and your needs, I am willing to negotiate further. My counteroffer for the product is $750,000.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me.  To be honest, $750,000 is a bit of a stretch. I can go up to $700,000, but that's my absolute limit.
I understand your position, Bob. After careful consideration, I am prepared to offer the product to you for $680,000. This is my final offer within this negotiation process.
